This happened again in N20060125-0010. Kim, does this fail for you when you run the tests?
I just ran the dynamic suite in isolation and wasn't able to reproduce the failure.  Unfortunately, I don't have time to run the full suites at the moment as they take ~20 minutes for me.

I've committed a small change which will squeeze a bit of performance out of this.  Part of the problem is simply that there are parallel streams parsing the registry: one parses it into actions, and another parses it into commands.
This seems to be fixed in the nightly builds.  I'll move it to fixed and cross my fingers.
I think I've only bought myself some time with this.  The larger performance issue is covered by Bug 126901.  For now, the test machines seem to be passing, which is enough for 3.2 M5.
